thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 16 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Resilient REIT Says To Undertake Independent Review Of Information

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Resilient REIT Says To Undertake Independent Review Of Information

organizations.name: to undertake independent review of information feb 16

text:
Feb 16 (Reuters) - Resilient Reit Ltd:
* RESILIENT REIT - ‍HAS NOTED CONSISTENT FEEDBACK FROM ITS SHAREHOLDERS THAT CROSS-SHAREHOLDING OF RESILIENT WITH FORTRESS REIT LIMITED SHOULD BE UNWOUND​
* ‍BELIEVES THAT THERE IS A NEED FOR A PROMPT INDEPENDENT REVIEW OF INFORMATION AVAILABLE TO IT​
* RESOLVED TO COMMISSION THEIR OWN INDEPENDENT REVIEW AND TO MAKE OUTCOME OF THIS REVIEW PUBLIC​
* RESILIENT REIT - ‍NOTES THAT ANY INVESTIGATION OF SHARE TRANSACTIONS BY REGULATORS WOULD BE UNDERTAKEN WITH BROAD ACCESS TO INFORMATION NOT AVAILABLE TO CO​
* RESILIENT - ‍SCOPE OF REVIEW WILL NOT BE NARROWLY CONSTRAINED AND WILL PRIORITISE REVIEW OF ALL AVAILABLE INFORMATION REGARDING LISTED SHARE ACTIVITY SINCE 1 JULY 2017 BY CO AND EXECUTIVES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
